column1: Uchi////We started off the evening with Nathan explaining the menu and asking if we wanted to order things off the menu or if we wanted him to just send out a few things he thought we'd like so we could get a feel for what Uchi is. We did that and did not regret it. We ended up sharing about eight dishes
column2: each more delicious than the last. Their Walu Walu is to die for
column3: their hirame usuzukuri is mouthwatering. Even their uchi salad is delicious -- my boyfriend and I ate every bit of it and he's one of those people I need to trick into eating greens in his diet.
